title: A Certain Middle-aged Man’s VRMMO Activity Log - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Archery   Average-looking Protagonist   Blacksmith   Cooking   Crafting   Dense Protagonist   Dragons   Elves   Fairies   Grinding   Herbalist   Male Protagonist   Merchants   MMORPG   Sword And Magic   Unique Weapon User   Virtual Reality
author: Shiina Howahowa   椎名ほわほわ
description: 38-year-old Tanaka Daichi’s childhood dream of playing a VRMMO has finally come to life. As he creates his character, he decides to choose skills that are considered useless by others, since he has no interest in playing like a main character. Follow the adventures of Daichi as he strives to use his mismatched set of worthless skills to achieve his dream goal of simply being able to enjoy an alternate life in a virtual reality.>
